SEARCH

Class CoffeeTruckImp

java.lang.Object
CoffeeTruckImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoffeeTruck
public final class CoffeeTruckImp extends Object implements CoffeeTruck
This class implements the interface CoffeeTruck of the application, representing the management of a coffee truck
. We make the class final, to avoid any further class specialising it more.

    • Coffee

      public int Coffee(String type, int numSugars, float price, boolean milk, int size, boolean heat)
      This is a method to create a coffee related product
      Specified by:
      Coffee in interface CoffeeTruck
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of coffee
      numSugars - - the desired amount of sugar spoons in the coffee
      price - - the price of the coffee
      milk - - boolean to indicate does the user want milk in their coffee or not
      size - - integer to indicate small, medium or large sized cup
      heat - - boolean to indicate hot or iced coffee(1.hot/2.iced).
      Returns:
      The id of the coffee created.

    • Tea

      public int Tea(String type, int numSugars, float price, boolean milk, int size, String flavour)
      This is a method to create a tea related product
      Specified by:
      Tea in interface CoffeeTruck
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of tea
      numSugars - - the desired amount of sugar spoons in the tea
      price - - the price of the tea
      milk - - boolean to indicate does the user want milk in their tea or not
      size - - integer to indicate small, medium or large sized cup(1,2,3)
      flavour - - the flavour that the tea has
      Returns:
      The id of the tea created.
